Name: Merper VR
About the game: MeperVR allows you to pose and animate 3D models that contain a skinned mesh and skeletal structure in virtual reality. Models will automatically resize to human proportions on load, allowing you to virtually grab a part and arrange it into your desired pose. Animate poses by adding key frames, then play them back all around you. Supports reading and writing models in the industry standard FBX file format commonly used in games, allowing you to extend your existing workflows and rapidly prototype using its intuitive interface.
